biography: A model turned low budget Scream Queen turned professional wrestler (under the name "Vanessa Harding") turned MILF adult film actress (utilizing the alias "Elle Cee"). Culton bowed out of the adult film industry for good in 2009. After a decade long absence, she  made a return to legitimate films in the sci-fi spoof Starship II: Rendezvous with Ramses (2019) alongside John Astin.
name: Leslie Culton
